answers.answer: hello,this could be a sign of diabetic neuropathy.  How well is your diabetes controlled?  What is your HBA1C?You should discuss this symptom with your doctor.If it is neuropathy, it can be reversed in time (a few months) by controlling blood sugar very well (target HBA1C of < 6, and ideally low 5s - if this can be acheived without having too low blood sugar).let us know how you go and please ask any further questions you may have.

question: why do I feel like something is crawling on my skin
title: I have type 2 diabetes
